prompt: Create a modern admin dashboard with a light theme. Feature a top navigation bar with the title 'Admin Dashboard' in bold, a user profile avatar on the right, and a notification bell icon. Below the navigation, include a horizontal row of four statistical cards showing Total Users (2,134), Revenue ($67,430), Orders (1,056), and Growth Rate (15.3%). Each card should have distinct background colors (blue, green, red, purple), white text, bold metrics, and soft shadows. Below, add a 'Recent Activities' section with a vertical list of 5 activity items, each showing a circular avatar, activity description, and timestamp aligned to the right. Place a floating action button with a plus icon in the bottom-right corner. Use generous padding, rounded corners, and a clean, minimalistic Material Design aesthetic.
